caption.body: The husband-and-wife filmmaking team of Max Porter and Ru Kuwahata employ stop-motion to animate a 150-word poem by Ron Koerge in this poignant and bittersweet story about family, loss, and the finer points of packing a suitcase.  See “Negative Space” by Max Porter and Ru Kuwahata, now playing in the Video Arts Room located pre-security in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2mzdnMo
caption.excerpt: The husband-and-wife filmmaking team of Max Porter and Ru Kuwahata employ stop-motion to animate a 150-word poem by Ron Koerge in this poignant and bittersweet story about family, loss, and the finer points of packing a suitcase.
